articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Rajin Shipyard
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Rajin Shipyard 
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Rajin Shipyard.
					 After being briefed on the shipyard before a huge map showing its panoramic view, he went round different processes to learn in detail about shipbuilding. 
					
					 He was greatly pleased to see the officials, workers and technicians of the shipyard devotedly working to build a rich and powerful country full of optimism and confidence in the future. 
					
					 He praised the workers of the shipyard for their feats, noting that remaining true to the idea and leadership of the party and the leader, they built a lot of ships in the past, bravely weathering all sorts of difficulties and hardships and fully displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude, and thus made a big contribution to the nation's development of the shipbuilding industry. 
					
					 Our country which could not properly build even a boat before the country's liberation set up a strong shipbuilding industry under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and it is successfully building various type modern ships, he said, adding that this is a striking demonstration of the great vitality of the self-supporting national economy. 
					
					 Saying that the shipyard has an important role to play for developing the nation's shipbuilding industry, he put forth tasks facing the shipyard. 
					
					 It is of very weighty importance for our country surrounded by seas on its three sides to massively build various type fishing boats as well as large cargo ships for developing the fishing industry, marine transport and foreign trade, he said, underlining the need for the shipyard to continue waging a dynamic struggle to build more cargo ships. 
					
					 He said that shipbuilding is an important index showing the country's level of industrial development, underlining the need for the shipyard to further develop shipbuilding technology and cut down the time for shipbuilding and steadily improve their quality by putting the processes on a scientific and modern basis. 
					
					 He called for actively introducing the latest science and technology and waging a dynamic mass technical innovation movement to comprehensively apply computer-aided designing of ships and CNC technology to hull processing and assembling. 
					
					 In order to boost the building of ships, it is necessary for the relevant domains to produce necessary materials, equipment and raw materials and supply them to the shipyard in good time, he said. 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the workers of the shipyard would creditably perform their honorable mission and duty and thus demonstrate the heroic spirit and mettle to win a sure victory in the drive for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Thae Jong Su, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Myong Su, minister of People's Security, and Hyon Chol Hae, department director of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Agitation Group of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Agitation Group of KPA
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by an art agitation group of KPA Large Combined Unit 264.
					 When he appeared in the auditorium, all the performers and audience enthusiastically welcomed him with highest tribute to him.
					
					 Their repertoire included "A Sentry Offers Warm Salute to the Leader", "Song of the Korean People's Army", "Spring of Hoeryong", "Song of Anti-Japanese War" and "Glory to Our Great Party".
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the invincible might of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu which has grown to be a matchless one under the care of the great brilliant commander and the unshakable faith and will of the servicepersons to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms at any cost true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He appreciated the revolutionary creating spirit of the creators of new culture in the era of Songun, noting that the performers successfully presented the real picture of the revolutionary army dynamically advancing full of optimism and joy, possessed of a transparent view on the leader and the revolution,
					
					 The performance made by the above-said art agitation group is the best of those given by art agitation groups recently, he said, highly praising all the creators and artistes for their spectacular success and extending thanks to them.
					
					 The servicepersons have grown to be indomitable soldiers who consider the spirit of devotedly safeguarding the leader and the spirit of becoming human bombs as unshakable faith, he said, adding that the best Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses is sure to triumph as the country is firmly defended by this matchless army.
					
					 Noting that art agitation is very important for the ideological education of the servicepersons as it has great influence and strong appeal, he set forth important tasks to be served as guidelines for intensifying the revolutionary and militant art agitation.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Thae Jong Su, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Myong Su, minister of People's Security, and Hyon Chol Hae, department director of the NDC, and KPA General Choe Pu Il, member of the Central Military Commission of the WPK.

articles.title: Notice to South Side on Intensified Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Notice to South Side on Intensified Smear Campaign
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The head of the north side to the inter-Korean general-level military talks Friday sent a notice to the puppet military of the south side as regards the extreme confrontation racket by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					  The south side is persisting in the dirty action of scattering anti-DPRK leaflets, despite the north side's repeated warnings, while committing such reckless military provocations as firing bullets at it.
					
					 It scattered more than 200,000 leaflets at Rimjin Pavilion in Phaju City on April 15 and 1.2 million around Samgot-ri, Jung-myon, Ryonchon County in the central sector of the front on April 14, stealthily acting like a cat burglar for fear of merciless counteraction by the army of the DPRK.
					
					 It also perpetrated unpardonable military provocation such as firing 12.7 mm large-calibre machine gun in direction of the north side at random from 516 gendarme post at 19:38 on April 15.
					
					 Those facts prove that the present puppet authorities are getting evermore pronounced in the bellicose stand to escalate the north-south confrontation and finally bring the situation to the brink of war, the head of the north side pointed out. 
					
					 Then he solemnly notified the following principled stand of the Korean People's Army:
					
					 As already and evidently clarified, leaflet scattering is a form of psychological warfare and it is just a clear-cut war provocation to a warring side.
					
					 Accordingly, it is our invariable stand that direct fire at the area where leaflets are let fly will be a legitimate punishment by the army of the DPRK, a warring side, to the breakers of the Armistice Agreement.
					
					 Moreover, the south side resorts to scattering of leaflets, moving places in a cunning way for fear of counteraction by our army. Under this situation, our army officially informs the south side that it will expand the scope of direct fire, already declared, into full-scale destruction fire at any area anytime.
					
					 We remind again the south side of our stand that its reckless anti-DPRK confrontation moves will result only in unpredictable and merciless punishment from our army.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors should stop at once the reckless confrontation moves, clearly understanding the will of the army and people of the DPRK never to pardon any provocation no matter how it is committed.

articles.title: Early Inter-Korean Red Cross Contact Once Again Urged
articles.content:
Early Inter-Korean Red Cross Contact Once Again Urged
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the C.C., the DPRK Red Cross Society on Friday sent another notice to his south Korean counterpart, urging north-south Red Cross working contact to discuss the matter of face-to-face confirmation of the will of the four inhabitants of the DPRK detained by the south Korean authorities, and their repatriation.
					 The DPRK repeatedly made the above-said demand on March 30 and April 1, but the south side has not responded to it so far, the notice pointed out, once again strongly urging the south side to have a Red Cross working contact to solve the issue as early as possible.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities do not meet this demand of the DPRK and persistently refuse to send back the inhabitants to it, this will be little short of admitting themselves their abduction and operations to force them to "defect" to the south, it said, warning that they would be held wholly accountable for their grave impact on the north-south relations.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Nigerian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Nigerian President
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Goodluck Ebele Jonathan upon his election as President of Nigeria.
					Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation existing between the two countries will grow stronger, Kim in the message wished the Nigerian President greater success in his work for national unity and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Djiboutian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Djiboutian President
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Ismail Omar Guelleh upon his reelection as President of Djibouti.
					 Kim in the message wished him fresh success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Mongolian Party Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with the delegation of the Mongolian People's Party led by General Secretary U. Khurelsukh at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday. 
					 The general secretary said that the friendly relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung have a long history and the friendly and cooperative relations between the WPK and his party would continue to develop.
					
					 2012 is a significant year marking the centenary of birth of the President, he said, expressing belief that the Korean people would surely attain their goal.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Congratulates Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Congratulates Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 79th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 Doyen of the Corps Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy in Pyongyang, conveyed them to an official concerned on Friday.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Feted
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Feted
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Ministry of the People's Armed Forces gave a reception for the military attaches corps here on April 22 on the occasion of the 79th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the corps headed by Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Vice-Minister Pak Jae Gyong and generals and other officers of the KPA were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions on Day of Sun
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions on Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Political parties, government ministries, organizations, institutions and personages of different countries, sent floral baskets to DPRK missions between April 2 and 15 to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 They included the Commission for External Affairs of the C.C., Communist Party, the Defence Ministry, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ministry of Public Security, Ministry of Industry and Commerce, the C.C., Fatherland Front, the C.C., Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union, the C.C., Farmers Union and the Ho Chi Minh Museum of Vietnam, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Club, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association and the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten.
					
					 Also among them were the Ministry of Defence and Armed Forces Logistics, the National Youth Organization, the Workers' House and the International Taekwon-Do Association of Iran and the Iran-Korea Parliamentary Friendship Group, the People's Party, FUNCINPEC Party, the Parliament, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, the Ministry of Defense and the Ministry of Information of Cambodia, the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, the C.C., Communist Party (Marxist) of India, the Laos-Korea Friendship Association,  the C.C., Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, the Chinese embassy in Switzerland, the African National Congress, the African National Congress Youth League of South Africa and the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of South Africa, the Communist Party (Red Motherland of Peru, the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, the Workers' Party, the People's Socialist Party, the Socialist Popular Party, the Socialist Party, the Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Fellowship Institute to Honor the Memory of President Kim Il Sung, the National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification in Mexico and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association.
					
					 The personages included the vice-prime minister and minister of Defence, the chairman of the Organization Commission of the C.C., People's Revolutionary Party, the secretary of the C.C., People's Revolutionary Youth Union and the secretary general of the Ministry of Public Security of Laos, vice-presidents of Syria, the deputy general secretary and the director of the Organizational Department of the Regional Leadership of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party, the vice-chairman of the National Progressive Front, the foreign minister, the defence minister, the president of the Trade Unions Federation and the chairman of the General Union of Peasants of Syria, the chairman of the Islamic Revolutionary Proletarian Organization of Iran, the head of the group of advisors to the king and the advisor to the prime minister of Cambodia, the secretary general of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar, the chief of the Emperor Group of Hong Kong, China, the general secretary of the Guinean People's Assembly, the general secretary of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, the governor of Municipality of San Isidro, Lima City and the president of the Mexico-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group.

articles.title: Japan's Designation of East Sea of Korea as "Japan Sea" Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Designation of East Sea of Korea as "Japan Sea" Slammed
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A symposium of officials in the field of social sciences took place here to condemn the Japanese reactionaries for their designation of the East Sea of Korea as the "Japan Sea".
					 Present there were Thae Hyong Chol, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, officials concerned and officials, teachers and researchers in the fields of science and education.
					
					 Speakers explained and proved in detail the validity of the name of the East Sea of Korea and the unreasonable designation of it as the "Japan Sea" through historic documents and map data.
					
					 They went on: Our ancestors made massive inroads into the Japanese archipelago, exploring the East Sea of Korea from the ancient times. They set up the Usan State by bringing Ulrung Island and Tok Islets under their control. In this course they acquired profound knowledge and understanding of the East Sea and named the sea off Korea "East Sea of Korea" before any others. This name had been used till the end of the Ri dynasty.
					
					 The name "Japan" appeared in the world from the latter half of the 7th century and the name of the country called "Korea" has a five thousand years-long history. In view of this fact it is as clear as noonday historically and from its origin that the above-said controversial sea has been called the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 After fabricating the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" in 1905, the Japanese imperialists began to designate "Sea of Korea" as "Japan Sea" in the maps of Japan. They became all the pronounced in their moves to name "Japan Sea" after occupying Korea.
					
					 When Korea was barred from sending its delegate to the conference of the International Hydrographic Organization held in 1929, the Japanese imperialists registered the East Sea of Korea as "Japan Sea" in a cunning way.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have recently resorted to foolish moves to make "Japan Sea" recognized and preserved by the international community in a bid to "protect" it.
					
					 They are making desperate efforts to preserve their unilateral designation of "Japan Sea" but their ambition will be decisively shattered and the fair and aboveboard international standardization of geographical name of the East Sea of Korea will be certainly realized for its truth and justice.

articles.title: Venue of Kimilsungia Festival Draws Endless Crowd of Visitors
articles.content:
Venue of Kimilsungia Festival Draws Endless Crowd of Visitors 
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- More than 130 000 potted Kimilsungias, immortal flowers of the sun, have been displayed since the Kimilsungia festival started and at least 4.7 million servicepersons, people from all walks of life, school youth and children have visited the venue of the festival.
					 The festival has been an annual event since the first festival held on the occasion of the Day of the Sun in Juche 88 (1999). Profound reverence of all people for the peerlessly great man has been expressed during this period.
					
					 Diplomatic missions of various countries and international organizations here, foreign organizations for friendship and solidarity, foreigners, members of associations for supporting the dissemination of immortal flowers, Chinese residents in the DPRK and Koreans in Japan cultivated Kimilsungias with deep care and presented them to the festival and many foreign guests and overseas Koreans have visited the venue of the festival.
					
					 Nearly 20 000 potted Kimilsungias were displayed in the venue of the festival this year and hundreds of thousands of people visited the venue.

articles.title: System of DPRK Serving Masses of People Praised
articles.content:
System of DPRK Serving Masses of People Praised
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Artistes of different countries, who participated in the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival, gave their impressions after spending a pleasant time at the Kaeson Youth Park here.
					Raverdel Christian, head of the Chamber Orchestra Alberic Magnard of France, said that he had seen such splendid and animated park built in a modern style for the first time. 
					
					Jin Li, a member of the Jilin Provincial Symphony Orchestra of China, said that she was deeply moved to see the people enjoy the best amusement facilities to the full. In other countries people cannot have the heart to enjoy at such park because of too much payment, she added.
					
					The DPRK where everything serves the people is a great country, she noted.
					
					A member of the Circus of State Acrobatic Company of Russia said: It is, indeed, excellent. I had been to famous pleasure parks in other countries, but this is the first to have entertained me so much.
					
					Lazarenko Veronika, a member of the "Step-Class" Dance Troupe of Ukraine, said that she saw the cultural recreation centre full of people's joy under the love of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					Maikel Duniesky Jimenez Cancio, head of the guitar trio of Cuba, said that he deeply felt once again the warm benevolence of Kim Jong Il who spares nothing for the people.

articles.title: Plenary Meeting of GFTUK
articles.content:
Plenary Meeting of GFTUK
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The 68th Plenary Meeting of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea took place here on Friday.
					 Present there were members of the C.C., the GFTUK and trade union officials in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					The meeting discussed the tasks facing the trade union organizations to carry through the important tasks laid down in "On Developing the 'Lathe No. 26' Model Machine Movement onto a New Higher Stage in Keeping with the Requirement of the Great Drive for Building a Thriving Nation", a work published by General Scretary Kim Jong Il on March 30, Juche 100 (2011).
					
					 Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the GFTUK, made a report at the meeting which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers stressed that the work is an important guideline as it indicates the way for putting the national economy as a whole on a modern and CNC basis by developing in depth the "lathe No. 26" model machine movement onto a new higher stage.
					
					 They underlined the need for the trade union organizations at all levels to conduct this movement in close combination with various mass movements and thus contribute to improving the standard of people's living and building an economic power.

articles.title: Social Education in DPRK
articles.content:
Social Education in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The social education system has steadily developed in the DPRK along with the professional and study-while-working education systems.
					 Social education is provided through schoolchildren's palaces and halls, youth halls, libraries and other extracurricular education centers and institutions.
					
					 Schoolchildren's palaces and halls throughout the country give education in computer and art.
					
					 They have produced many reserve scientists, artistes and sportspersons.
					
					 The Grand People's Study House has established a tele-education system available for all people in scientific study and research.
					
					 Libraries throughout the country provide people with information necessary for getting a wide knowledge.

articles.title: Popular Chewing Gem
articles.content:
Popular Chewing Gem
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Unbangul-trademarked chewing gem is popular among Korean people.
					 It, produced by the Pyongyang Chewing Gum Factory, divides into scores of varieties, including peppermint, grape and strawberry gems.
					
					 Ho Yon Hui, a teacher of the Changgwang Kindergarten in Pyongyang, told KCNA that the gem makes the gums and fangs strong, removes the tartar and halitosis, and prevents caries of the teeth.
					
					 Hong Jong Suk, a 48-year-old woman living in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang, said that it activates cerebration and promotes digestion and absorption of food.

articles.title: Choesung Pavilion on Moran Hill
articles.content:
Choesung Pavilion on Moran Hill
						
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Choesung Pavilion is one of the tourist attractions in Pyongyang.
					 The pavilion standing on the peak of Moran Hill is a spectacular sight.
					
					 Originally, the pavilion was called Osung. But it was renamed Choesung later as it commands an excellent view.
					
					 The pavilion was rebuilt in 1716.
					
					 The single-storied building with a hip-saddle roof and double eaves has battlements and a whole ceiling.
					
					 A legend says fairies came down from sky and enjoyed themselves around the pavilion enclosed with many beautiful flowers and trees.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Founder of Songun Idea
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Founder of Songun Idea
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Korean people will soon greet the 79th anniversary of the Korean People's Army, which falls on April 25.
					 On this occasion, they are recollecting the feats of President Kim Il Sung, who founded the Songun idea.
					
					 The idea calls for giving priority to military affairs, strengthening the driving force of the revolution with the army as the core and propelling the revolution based on the role of the army. 
					
					 The President, basing himself on a deep analysis of the specific situation of the anti-Japanese and national liberation movement of Korea and lesson drawn from it, created the idea in the early 1930s.
					
					 The idea traces its origin back to the two pistols his father Kim Hyong Jik gave him and the programme of the "Down-with-Imperialism Union" (DIU).
					
					 The pistols reflected what Kim Hyong Jik acquired, guiding the liberation movement for years, a profound truth that armed enemies should be fought with arms.
					
					 The President formed the DIU, a vanguard organization for achieving national liberation and class emancipation, in October Juche 15 (1926) and put forward its programme.
					
					 The programme calls for defeating imperialism, that is, launching an armed struggle. 
					
					 He convened a meeting of cadres of the Young Communist League and the Anti-imperialist Youth League in Kalun from late June to early July Juche 19 (1930) and made public the Songun idea, together with the Juche idea.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Remarks over Tour of Mt. Kumgang Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Remarks over Tour of Mt. Kumgang Slammed
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Some time ago, the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee clarified the stand that it would terminate the validity of the provision of the agreement on tour of Mt. Kumgang signed with the Hyundai side, which calls for granting it monopoly over the tour, and, consequently, the Hyundai side may undertake only the tour through areas of the south side while the DPRK will take charge of the international tour through the areas of the north side.
					 However, the south Korean authorities dismissed this measure of the DPRK side as "a violation of the agreement between businesses and the one between the authorities." They went the lengths of blustering that it is "unacceptable" and "such measure should be retracted" as "it is contrary to international practice." 
					
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 What they uttered is nothing but a far-fetched assertion which cut no ice with anyone.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are in no position to talk about any violation of the agreement between the two authorities as they categorically denied the north-south joint declarations and have turned their faces away from their implementation, the commentary notes, and goes on:  The international practice touted by them only betrayed their ignorance. It is the international usage that when a contracting party fails to implement the contract, the other contracting party urges the former to honor its duty under the contract and declares the contract invalid.
					
					 The measure taken by the DPRK side was a legitimate exercise of its sovereignty in its own country and land.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' remarks taking issue with the DPRK's measure are, in a nutshell, aimed to mislead public opinion and evade the responsibility for having derailed the above-said tour. 
					
					  Thrown into a tight corner by the just measure taken by the DPRK side, the conservative group is running the whole gamut of rhetoric in a bid to pass the buck for having derailed the tour of Mt. Kumgang on the DPRK.
					
					 As clarified by KAPPC, the DPRK side will as ever maintain the relations of good faith and cooperation with the Hyundai and make sustained efforts to realize the wishes of the south Korean people to tour Mt. Kumgang.

articles.title: US, S. Korea Accused of Blocking Dialogue
articles.content:
US, S. Korea Accused of Blocking Dialogue 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea in a commentary on April 18 blasted the United States and the south Korean puppet authorities for blocking the dialogue with the DPRK.
					 The commentary accused the U.S. secretary of State and the south Korean minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of holding talks at which they called for "the north's responsible measure" as regards the "Cheonan" case, etc. and put up this issue as a pre-condition for dialogue.
					
					 This approach and stand would not help advance any negotiations for improving the relations with the DPRK but would only steadily escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula, it noted.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean authorities truly want the improved relations with the DPRK, they should stop putting up their unreasonable pre-conditions and opt for immediate dialogue and negotiations for achieving peace, urged the commentary.

articles.title: More Facts about April 19 Popular Uprising
articles.content:
More Facts about April 19 Popular Uprising 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Society for Commemorating the Movement for Democracy of south Korea Tuesday opened a homepage on the April 19 Popular Uprising and posted on it more facts about the uprising testified to by witnesses.
					 They testified to the fact that the fascist dictatorial forces indiscriminately suppressed uprisers.
					
					 According to their testimonies, hooligans attacked the demonstrators' column on April 18 when the uprising was at its height.
					
					 An armed group fired at demonstrators in front of Kyongmudae the next day.
					
					 The police shot demonstrators to death and mercilessly beat those alive with clubs till they fell unconscious in Kwangju.
					
					 Also disclosed was the fact that the U.S. was directly involved in the crackdown upon the uprisers.
					
					 Kim Un Yong who was the then aide-de-camp of Song Yo Chan, martial law commander, said as follows: "There was a huddle with the U.S. over how to bring the uprising under control. Commanding officers of the U.S. 8th Army came to learn about the tendency of the s. Korean troops every day. The movement of armed forces was impossible without the approval of the U.S. forces. It was, therefore, deeply involved in the declaration of the martial law and the subsequent movement of the troops."

articles.title: Apology Promised by Kinsmen of Syngman Rhee Termed Hypocritical
articles.content:
Apology Promised by Kinsmen of Syngman Rhee Termed Hypocritical  
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations related to the April 19 popular uprising made public a joint statement on April 18 terming the apology promised by kinsmen of traitor Syngman Rhee hypocritical. 
					 The organizations voiced strong opposition to the promise made by kinsmen of Rhee to make an "apology" to the victims of the uprising and their bereaved families and visit the April 19 democratic cemetery. 
					
					 The organizations said: For more than five decades they have kept mum but they talked about "apology" all of a sudden. This is aimed to erect a statue of Rhee at Kwanghwamun. 
					
					 They warned that they would hold in check their entry into the cemetery, should they come to its area.

articles.title: Authorities' Anti-DPRK Psychological Campaign under Fire
articles.content:
Authorities' Anti-DPRK Psychological Campaign under Fire 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore in an editorial on April 15 accused the authorities of conducting an anti-DPRK psychological campaign.
					 The editorial said: When  South Korean Buddhist Jogye Order refused to light the light tower on Aegi Hill in Kimpho City, Kyonggi Province, a forefront area, this year, the military authorities are looking for other religious organization for lighting the light tower.
					
					 Accusing the military authorities of deliberately inventing a pretext for sparking a clash between the south and the north, the editorial branded this as an irresponsible attitude as they are utterly indifferent to the uneasiness and pain of the people.
					
					 The editorial urged the authorities to stop looking for other organization for lighting the light tower at once and make efforts to have contact and exchange with the north in diverse ways, whether they are made by the "government" or by non-governmental organizations.

articles.title: Struggle in Unity Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle in Unity Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on April 19, the 51st anniversary of the April 19 Popular Uprising. 
					 The statement noted that 51 years have passed since the south Korean people, including youth and students, rose up against the fraudulent election of the Syngman Rhee dictatorial forces. 
					
					 After the overthrow of the Syngman Rhee regime the U.S. has put forward other dictators to kill people and seek permanent division of the Korean nation while bringing nuclear war crisis to this land, it said. 
					
					 The statement called upon all the people to cherish the spirit of the April 19 uprisers and struggle in unity to build a democratic, new society.

articles.title: Gag on Freedom of Speech in S. Korea
articles.content:
Gag on Freedom of Speech in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The puppet Seoul Central District Court of south Korea sentenced Jo Jung Won, representative of the Internet media agency, to two-year prison term on the charge of violation of the "National Security Law". 
					 The court charged him, who posted on Internet website articles and animations praising the Juche idea, the Songun politics of the DPRK, with "crime of spreading enemy-benefiting files". 
					
					 Protesting against this ruling, Jo Jung Won expressed wrath at the absurd action of gagging on pressman's freedom of thought and expression by invoking the NSL which has had no justification to exist any longer.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Syrian and Brazilian Personages
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Syrian and Brazilian Personages 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Syrian and Brazilian personages made public statements on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Saber Ballul, department head of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus, in his statement on April 14 said that the President founded the immortal Juche idea that man is the master of his destiny and has strength to carve out his own destiny.
					
					 The President was the invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated two imperialisms in one generation, he said, and went on:
					
					 Thanks to the Juche idea the Korean people will build a thriving socialist nation, frustrating the moves of the imperialists. 
					
					 The President is always alive in the hearts of the world progressives as the sun of mankind. 
					
					 Pedro De Oliveira, assistant to the national chairman of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, in a statement on April 11 praised the undying exploits of the President who defeated the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history and made a great contribution to the cause of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Biography of Kim Il Sung Posted on Peruvian Internet Website
articles.content:
Biography of Kim Il Sung Posted on Peruvian Internet Website 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship on April 11 posted on its Internet website President Kim Il Sung's brief history of revolutionary activities. 
					 The website carried a portrait of the smiling President.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated Abroad 
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Organizations, institutions and political parties of Russia, Bangladesh and Brazil posted special write-ups on their Internet homepages on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					The Young Communist League of Russia posted on its Internet homepage on April 8 a picture of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il standing together with an article titled "Popular Leader".
					
					 The article recalled that the Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history in the Fatherland Liberation War and successfully carried out the postwar rehabilitation and construction and the historic task of socialist industrialization in a brief span of time. 
					
					  All these events are the results the President registered by actively enlisting the inexhaustible strength of the popular masses, it stressed.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper Blitz posted on its Internet homepage a portrait of the smiling President and several articles under the caption of "President Kim Il Sung Is Always Alive in Hearts of Mankind".
					
					 The articles noted that Mangyongdae, the birthplace of the President, is regarded as a sacred place of the revolution visited by endless stream of not only the Korean people but the world progressives.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its Internet homepage a portrait of the smiling President and an article titled "Statesman Possessed of Love for Human Being" on the same day.
					
					 The Brazilian Communist Party carried on its Internet homepage an article titled "The Korean People Commemorating the Birth Anniversary of Comrade Kim Il Sung" on April 14.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated Abroad 
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Seminars and reading sessions were held in Germany, Colombia, Tanzania, Democratic Congo and Uganda and by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement between April 9 and 14 to commemorate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Jairo Gonzalez Trujillo, president of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia, said that Kim Il Sung provided the historical roots of the Songun politics, an emblem of the dignity and honor of socialist Korea and treasured sword for its invincibility. 
					
					 Noting that he developed the revolutionary armed forces of Korea into an invincible army and built an independent and powerful defence industry, the speaker stressed that his exploits would shine forever with prospering socialist Korea. 
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism of Mjumbe University in Morogoro of Tanzania said that Kim Il Sung was the father of all people possessed of rare wisdom, distinguished leadership ability and noble virtues.
					
					 Osieno Stephen, executive advisor to the general secretary of the Pan-African Movement, said that the Korean people, closely united around General Secretary Kim Jong Il most successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the President, would surely build a thriving socialist nation in Korea in the near future. 
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event in Germany.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Observed in Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Observed in Guinea
Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The Guinean preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea jointly issued bulletin on April 11 to commemorate the birth anniversary of the President and the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Kim Il Sung and His Immortal Contribution to Global Independence" said that Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, is the pioneer and guide of global independence. It told about the fact that he rendered material and mental assistance to other countries and nations in building a new society.
					
					 His energetic leadership made it possible to greet a new history of the movement for rebuilding socialism and ensure the continued progress of the movement for independence as a whole, it said.
					
					 In another article titled "The Day of the Sun in the DPRK" the bulletin stressed that the President was a legendary great man who glorified his whole life like the sun with his august name called the sun.
					
					 In an article titled "NDC Chairman Kim Jong Il and the Invincible Korean People's Army" the bulletin elaborated on the historic significance of his election as NDC chairman and on his leadership exploits.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised in UK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised in UK 
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on April 15, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The statement said that Kim Il Sung is the great leader of Korea who fathered the immortal Juche idea, prominent statesman in the world and the iron-willed commander and gifted strategist who defeated the two U.S. and Japanese imperialisms. 
					
					 He set out the principles and line on building socialism and, through steadfast implementation of them, successfully built the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses and advanced correct lines on the world revolution including the lines for anti-U.S. struggle and global independence, it said, adding:
					
					 The Juche idea founded by him serves as the guideline for the progressives in the struggle for national liberation and class and human emancipation and gives us strength and courage.

articles.title: Palestinians Reject Possible US Aid Deduction
articles.content:
Palestinians Reject Possible US Aid Deduction
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Hanan Ashrawi, a member of Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO) Executive Committee, when interviewed by a broadcasting service on Apr. 18, strongly censured the U.S. threat.
					 He accused the U.S. of talking about any possible reduction of aid if the Palestinian National Authority (PNA) sought an international recognition of independence.
					
					 It clearly showed that the U.S. is supporting the extremist stand of Israel, he added.
					
					 He stressed that Israel must withdraw from all Palestinian lands it has occupied in 1967, including the West Bank and East Jerusalem.

articles.title: Earthquake Jolts New Zealand
articles.content:
Earthquake Jolts New Zealand
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- A 6.6 magnitude earthquake jolted the southern area of Kermadec Islands of New Zealand on April 18.
					 Its epicenter was the southwestern waters off the islands.

articles.title: Piracy Rampant Worldwide
articles.content:
Piracy Rampant Worldwide 
						
 Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Piracy is becoming rampant worldwide, sparking off great concern of the international community.
					 The International Maritime Organization in a report on April 14 said that 142 cases of piracy were perpetrated in oceans and seas of the world in the first quarter of this year.
					
					 It was reported that 97 cases of piracy were committed in the waters off Somalia, an increase of 35 cases over that in the same period of last year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Mina Juventud de Hyesan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Mina Juventud de Hyesan
						
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, dirigió sobre el terreno la Mina Juventud de Hyesan.
					Luego de escuchar la explicación ante el plano de la mina, se enteró detalladamente de los preparativos para revitalizar la producción recorriendo varios puntos.
					
					Al apreciar el hecho de que los funcionarios, obreros y técnicos de la mina impulsan enérgicamente la modernización y la cientifización de la mina sumándose a la corriente de nuevo y gran auge revolucionario, estimuló la lucha de ellos.
					
					Esta mina ocupa posición importante en la producción de metales no ferrosos, señaló y presentó las tareas programáticas que servirán de guía para desarrollarla con perspectivas.
					
					Apuntó que la tarea inmediata de la mina es acabar en un corto tiempo la reconstrucción técnica para aumentar trascendentalmente la producción de minerales.
					
					Diciendo que esta mina con ricos yacimientos de minerales de alta ley tiene buenas condiciones de extracción, destacó que si se realizan la modernización y la cientifización de todos sus procesos productivos, será posible lograr el rápido incremento de producción.
					
					Subrayó que hay que convertirla en una renombrada base de producción de metales no ferrosos concentrando todas las fuerzas.
					
					Continuó que la mina debe realizar la modernización y la cientifización de los procesos productivos basadas en ciencias y tecnologías de punta siguiendo el ejemplo de la Mina Juventud 5 de Marzo y hacer florecer la cultura avanzada de la clase obrera acondicionando la aldea de mineros como paraíso del socialismo.
					
					Expresó su gran esperanza y convicción de que los mineros de aquí cumplirán bien su honrosa misión y deber de exploradores de construcción de la economía socialista al frente de las filas que avanzan a pasos firmes en el fragor de gran auge revolucionario y manifestarán así su ímpetu heroico y espíritu indoblegable en la causa de construcción de la gran potencia próspera.
					
					Le acompañaron en esta ocasión Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buró Político y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del Buró Político y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buró Político del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Thae Jong Su, miembro suplente del Buró Político y secretario del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del Buró Político y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Myong Su, ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, y Hyon Chol Hae, jefe de departamento del CDN.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita a Raúl Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita a Raúl Castro Ruz 
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envió el día 19 un mensaje a Raúl Castro Ruz para felicitarle por la celebración exitosa del VI Congreso del Partido Comunista de Cuba y por su elección como Primer Secretario del Comité Central de esta organización.
					El texto del mensaje sigue:
					
					Deseo expresarle a Vd. mis calurosas felicitaciones y saludo camaraderil por la culminación exitosa del VI Congreso del Partido Comunista de Cuba y por su elección como Primer Secretario del Comité Central de la misma organización. 
					
					La elección de Vd. en ese cargo importante es una prueba de la gran confianza y esperanza depositadas en Vd. por todos los militantes de su partido y el pueblo cubano. 
					
					Convencido de que la amistad combativa y las fraternales y tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperación, establecidas entre los partidos y los pueblos de nuestros dos países se ampliarán y se desarrollarán más en el curso de la lucha conjunta por la independencia antiimperialista y el socialismo, aprovecho esta oportunidad para desearle de todo corazón grandes éxitos en sus trabajos responsables para el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo del partido y el avance victorioso de la Revolución Cubana.

articles.title: Funcionario militar envía aviso al círculo militar surcoreano
articles.content:
Funcionario militar envía aviso al círculo militar surcoreano
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ATCC) -- El jefe de la delegación del Norte a las conversaciones militares a nivel de general Norte-Sur envió el día 22 un aviso al círculo militar títere surcoreano en cuanto a que en estos días, llega al extremo el fanatismo de la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak por enfrentarse con la República Popular Democrática de Corea.
					Pese a las reiteradas advertencias de la parte Norte, la parte Sur sigue lanzando los volantes de contenido anti-RPDC y comete hasta las imprudentes provocaciones militares de disparar fusiles hacia el Norte. 
					
					El 15 de abril, por el temor a la implacable respuesta del Ejército Popular de Corea, los títeres surcoreanos lanzaron con sigilo felino más de 200 mil volantes desde el pabellón Rimjin de la ciudad de Phaju sin que lo vieran los habitantes.
					
					Un día antes, esparcieron un millón 200 mil en los alrededores de la comuna de Samgot del cantón de Jung del distrito de Ryonchon en la parte central del frente. 
					
					Para colmo, a las 19 y 38 del día 15, dispararon desde el puesto de gendarmería 516 hacia la parte Norte con una ametralladora de calibre 12.7mm.
					
					Al respecto, el jefe de la delegación del Norte subrayó que tales acciones demuestran que se torna más imprudente la posición belicosa de las actuales autoridades títeres surcoreanas de empeorar la confrontación fratricida N-S hasta que dé lugar a la guerra, y notificó solemnemente la siguiente posición de principios del EPC: 
					
					Ya hemos declarado claramente que el lanzamiento de volantes es una forma de guerra psicológica y un acto explícito para provocar la guerra contra la contraparte beligerante. 
					
					Por lo tanto, el fuego a puntería directa sobre los focos de lanzamiento será un castigo justo de nuestro ejército contra los que quiebran el Acuerdo de Armisticio. Esto es la invariable posición de nuestro ejército, una parte beligerante.
					
					Puesto que la parte Sur comete ese acto cambiando astutamente los lugares por el temor a la reacción de nuestro ejército, éste informa oficialmente que ampliará el ya notificado perímetro del fuego a puntería directa como el fuego de destrucción total que se dará en cualquier momento y alcanzará cualquier zona.
					
					Volvemos a recordar que las locuras conflictivas de la parte Sur contra la RPDC no darán otro resultado que la punición imprevisible e implacable de nuestro ejército.
					
					La banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak debe parar ahora mismo sus aventureras acciones en aras de enfrentamiento fratricida al ver bien la voluntad del ejército y el pueblo de la RPDC de no perdonar ni en lo mínimo ningún acto provocativo anti-RPDC por muy taimado que fuera.

articles.title: Presidente del CC de la ACR envía otro aviso a su homólogo surcoreano
articles.content:
Presidente del CC de la ACR envía otro aviso a su homólogo surcoreano
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ATCC) -- El presidente del Comité Central de la Asociación de la Cruz Roja de la República Popular Democrática de Corea volvió a enviar a su homólogo surcoreano un aviso urgiendo el contacto de trabajo de la cruz roja entre ambas partes coreanas para consultar la entrevista con 4 habitantes norcoreanos retenidos por las autoridades surcoreanas y la devolución de ellos. 
					El 30 de marzo y el primero de abril, la RPDC presentó repetidamente la misma propuesta, a la cual la parte surcoreana no ha respondido hasta la fecha a más de 20 días, señala el aviso.
					
					Demanda una vez más fuertemente a la parte Sur el contacto de trabajo de cruz roja para resolver el problema de 4 habitantes en cuestión. 
					
					Advierte que si las autoridades surcoreanas no los devuelven hasta el final negando tal propuesta de la RPDC, esto significaría reconocer por sí solas el secuestro forzado de ellos y la operación para "someterlos" y ellas se responsabilizarán de todas las graves consecuencias que se produzcan por eso en las relaciones N-S.

articles.title: Seminaristas exigen la denominación correcta del mar este
articles.content:
Seminaristas exigen la denominación correcta del mar este
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar en esta capital el seminario de ciencias sociales para desmentir la absurda opinión de los reaccionarios japoneses que tergiversaron el nombre del Mar Este de Corea como "Mar de Japón".
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasión el presidente de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales, Thae Hyong Chol, los funcionarios del sector correspondiente, los funcionarios, profesores e investigadores de las ramas de ciencia y educación.
					
					Los seminaristas revelaron con detallados datos históricos y mapas la legitimidad del nombre Mar Este de Corea y lo injusto de la denominación "Mar de Japón".
					
					Desde la edad antigua, los antepasados coreanos avanzaron masivamente al archipiélago japonés en el curso de explotación del Mar Este y fundaron el Estado Usan que tenía la jurisdicción sobre la isla Ulrung y el islote Tok.
					
					Ellos llegaron a tener una comprensión profunda y ricos conocimientos del Mar Este y lo nombraron oficialmente antes que nadie como "Mar Este de Corea" que había sido válido hasta finales de la Dinastía de los Ri.
					
					El nombre de "Japón" se dio al conocimiento del mundo desde la segunda mitad del siglo VII.
					
					Pero, el nombre de Corea tiene ya una historia de 5 milenios, lo cual da razón al nombre "Mar Este de Corea" tanto en sentido histórico como a la luz de su origen.
					
					Los seminaristas señalaron que después de inventar el "Tratado de 5 Puntos de Ulsa" en 1905, el imperialismo japonés comenzó la tergiversación de ese nombre que entró en etapa crucial tras la ocupación de Corea.
					
					Subrayaron que Japón registró de manera astuta el nombre "Mar de Japón" después de la conferencia de la Organización Internacional de Hidrografía efectuada en 1929.
					
					Revelaron que en estos días, los reaccionarios japoneses intentan defender el nombre distorsionado y recabar el reconocimiento de la sociedad internacional haciéndolo persistir en ésta.
					
					Por muy desesperadamente actúen ellos para mantener la denominación "Mar de Japón", el nombre "Mar Este de Corea" se mantendrá invariable porque refleja la historia, la verdad y la justicia, concluyeron.

articles.title: Organizaciones extranjeras conmemoran el Día del Sol
articles.content:
Organizaciones extranjeras conmemoran el Día del Sol
Pyongyang, 22 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del día de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, tuvieron lugar del día 9 al 14 simposios y encuentros de lectura en Alemania, Colombia, Tanzania, el Congo Democrático, Uganda y el Secretariado del Movimiento Panafricano. 
					El presidente del Grupo de Estudio de la Idea Juche Kanggye de Colombia, Jairo González Trujillo, dijo que el Presidente preparó la raíz histórica de la política de Songun que resulta el remedio omnipotente y el símbolo de dignidad y honor de la Corea socialista.
					
					Se refirió a que el Presidente desarrolló las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea como invencible ejército y construyó la industria de defensa nacional de carácter independiente y potente. Y agregó que las hazañas del Presidente brillarán eternamente junto con la Corea socialista en prosperidad. 
					
					El jefe del Grupo de Estudio del Kimilsunismo de la Universidad Mjumbe en Morogoro de Tanzania dijo que el Presidente fue padre de todo el mundo con extraordinaria inteligencia, destacada capacidad directiva y nobles virtudes. 
					
					El asesor ejecutivo del secretario general del Movimiento Panafricano, Osieno Stephen, destacó que el pueblo coreano, unido compactamente en torno a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, quien continúa satisfactoriamente la idea y la causa del Presidente, levantará sin falta en un futuro cercano sobre el territorio patrio una gran potencia próspera socialista. 
					
					En el acto efectuado en Alemania fue aprobado un mensaje remitido al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
